item.title: Hack the Box - Dancing
item.author: admin@fromzerotoone.in (FromZeroToOne)
item.description: Hi Hackers Welcome Back, Today we are going to look at Hack The Box Dancing Machine. Info Table Room Name Dancing Category Hack The Box OS Linux Difficulty Very Easy Maker Hack The Box Kill Chain Summery While enumerating ports and services we can able to find the port 445 ware open. while trying to connect with empty password. we got some shared access. Recon let’s start with initial default scan (-sC) , During scanning, we will typically see port 445 TCP open on the target, reserved for the SMB protocol.
item.dc:creator: Atom
